_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The seven awakening factors [sn46.27:2.3: The awakening factor of investigation of principles
How the seven awakening factors are deve: A mendicant develops the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity
The awakening factors rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation
The awakening factors ripen as letting go
